mapper.select: /* [설비 이력관리 - 그리드 페이징] pre_rec_mgmt.p0100.gridPaging */ SELECT REC_NO, L_CODE_NM, REG_DATE, ITEM_CODE_NM, IMPRV_COMM, CREATE_DT, CREATE_ID, (SELECT B.CODE_NM FROM SHC_COMM_CODE B WHERE SUBSTR(B.CODE_KIND,1,3)='APP' AND B.CODE = REVW_STATUS) AS REVW_STATUS, (SELECT B.CODE_NM FROM SHC_COMM_CODE B WHERE SUBSTR(B.CODE_KIND,1,3)='APP' AND B.CODE = APPR_STATUS) AS APPR_STATUS FROM ( SELECT SRPL.REC_NO, (SELECT L_CODE_NM FROM SHC_REC_MAIN B WHERE B.L_CODE = SRPL.L_CODE) AS L_CODE_NM, SRPL.REG_DATE, (SELECT IMPRV_COMM FROM SHC_REC_PRE_IMPRV B WHERE B.REC_NO = SRPL.REC_NO) AS IMPRV_COMM, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM SHC_COMM_CODE B WHERE B.CODE_KIND = SRPC.ITEM_CODE_KIND AND B.CODE = SRPC.ITEM_CODE) AS ITEM_CODE_NM, SRPL.CREATE_DT, SRPL.CREATE_ID, (SELECT B.REVW_STATUS FROM SHC_APPR_LIST B WHERE B.REC_NO = SRPL.REC_NO) AS REVW_STATUS, (SELECT B.APPR_STATUS FROM SHC_APPR_LIST B WHERE B.REC_NO = SRPL.REC_NO) AS APPR_STATUS FROM SHC_REC_PRE_LIST SRPL LEFT JOIN SHC_REC_PRE_COMM SRPC ON SRPL.REC_NO = SRPC.REC_NO WHERE 1=1 AND L_CODE = #{recLargeCode} AND SRPL.CREATE_DT BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{thisYearFirst}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{thisYearLast}, " 23:59:59"), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ) A ORDER BY CREATE_DT DESC LIMIT #{perPage} OFFSET #{offset}

/* [설비 이력관리 - 엑셀 다운리스트 가져오기] pre_rec_mgmt.p0100.selectRecPreListForExcel */ SELECT REG_DATE, L_CODE_NM, IMPRV_COMM, (SELECT B.CODE_NM FROM SHC_COMM_CODE B WHERE SUBSTR(B.CODE_KIND,1,3)='APP' AND B.CODE = A.REVW_STATUS) AS REVW_STATUS, (SELECT B.CODE_NM FROM SHC_COMM_CODE B WHERE SUBSTR(B.CODE_KIND,1,3)='APP' AND B.CODE = A.APPR_STATUS) AS APPR_STATUS FROM ( SELECT REC_NO, (SELECT L_CODE_NM FROM SHC_REC_MAIN B WHERE B.L_CODE = A.L_CODE) AS L_CODE_NM, REG_DATE, (SELECT IMPRV_COMM FROM SHC_REC_PRE_IMPRV B WHERE B.REC_NO = A.REC_NO) AS IMPRV_COMM, CREATE_DT, CREATE_ID, (SELECT B.REVW_STATUS FROM SHC_APPR_LIST B WHERE B.REC_NO = A.REC_NO) AS REVW_STATUS, (SELECT B.APPR_STATUS FROM SHC_APPR_LIST B WHERE B.REC_NO = A.REC_NO) AS APPR_STATUS FROM SHC_REC_PRE_LIST A WHERE 1=1 AND L_CODE = #{recLargeCode} AND CREATE_DT BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{thisYearFirst}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{thisYearLast}, " 23:59:59"), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ) A ORDER BY A.CREATE_DT DESC
SELECT M_CODE, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM SHC_COMM_CODE A WHERE CODE_KIND=M_CODE_KIND AND CODE = M_CODE) M_CODE_NM FROM SHC_REC_PRE WHERE L_CODE = 'P0100' AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER by ORD_SEQ, M_CODE
mapper.insert: /* [설비 이력관리 - 선행요건일지별개선조치 등록] pre_rec_mgmt.p0100.insertPreImprv */ INSERT INTO SHC_REC_PRE_IMPRV ( REC_NO, SEQ, BREAK_YN, IMPRV_YN, IMPRV_COMM, CREATE_ID, CREATE_DT ) VALUES ( #{newRecNo}, '1', 'Y', 'Y', #{imprvComm}, #{userId}, STR_TO_DATE(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') )
mapper.select: /* [설비 이력관리 - 선행요건일지별개선조치 가져오기] pre_rec_mgmt.p0100.selectPreImprvInfo */ SELECT REC_NO, SEQ, BREAK_YN, IMPRV_YN, IMPRV_COMM, CREATE_ID, CREATE_DT FROM SHC_REC_PRE_IMPRV WHERE REC_NO = #{recNo}

/* [설비 이력관리 - 인증원으로 보낼 체크 리스트 가져오기] pre_rec_mgmt.p0100.selectFinalCheckList */ SELECT #{lcnsNo} AS LCNS_NO ,#{companyNm} AS COMPANY_NM ,DATE_FORMAT(SRPL.CREATE_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS CREATE_DATE ,DATE_FORMAT(SRPL.CREATE_DT, '%H:%i:%s') AS CREATE_TIME ,L_CODE AS REC_CODE ,(SELECT L_CODE_NM FROM SHC_REC_MAIN B WHERE B.L_CODE = SRPL.L_CODE) AS REC_NM ,(SELECT CODE_NM FROM SHC_COMM_CODE B WHERE B.CODE_KIND = ITEM_CODE_KIND AND B.CODE = SRPC.ITEM_CODE) AS EQUIP_NM ,(SELECT BREAK_YN FROM SHC_REC_PRE_IMPRV B WHERE B.REC_NO = SRPL.REC_NO) AS BREAK_YN ,(SELECT IMPRV_COMM FROM SHC_REC_PRE_IMPRV B WHERE B.REC_NO = SRPL.REC_NO) AS IMPRV_COMM ,SRPC.SEQ AS SEQ ,SRPL.RMK FROM SHC_REC_PRE_LIST SRPL LEFT JOIN SHC_REC_PRE_COMM SRPC ON SRPL.REC_NO = SRPC.REC_NO WHERE SRPL.REC_NO = #{recNo}

/* [설비 이력관리 - 인증원에서 받을 일자별 순번] pre_rec_mgmt.p0100.selectCountRecSeq */ SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM SHC_REC_PRE_COMM A INNER JOIN SHC_APPR_LIST B ON A.REC_NO = B.REC_NO WHERE 1=1 AND B.NOW_APPR_STATUS = '200' AND A.ITEM_CODE_KIND = (SELECT B.REF_COMM_CODE FROM SHC_REC_MAIN B WHERE B.L_CODE = #{recLargeCode}) AND DATE_FORMAT(A.CREATE_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{todayString}
